name: Falling Pinball ！Dancing Balls
description:
Falling Pinball is a playful brick breaker game for iOS!

How to play?
Crush all bricks before it reaches the check-line. Swipe your finger to aim and shoot all the balls, make them roll among the bricks. Falling Pinball is a nonstop shooting ball action game, no need to wait for the ball to roll back. Hit special bricks to get special buff, but be careful with the tricky one such as invisible and moving bricks. Don't forget it also has physics in it, so be careful with your aim!

Game Features:
◉ Physic ball bouncy engine
◉ Nonstop ball shooting gameplay
◉ Simple and casual gameplay
◉ Global Leaderboards
◉ Collectible themes

Falling Pinball is suitable for all ages and FREE to play.
Come download and become Falling Pinball Master!
